message: is there is a way to do UPNP through java script  ?  i have been searching about this but the only implementations i could find ( like this one https://richtr.github.io/plug.play.js ) are dependent on navigator.getNetworkServices API  which apparently is only supported by opera now

data.message:
all I know is that UPnP is an XML-based API used by programs to configure temporary port forwarding on a router.
I once sniffed the packets and looked at that XML and it didn't look very complicated, so it might not be that hard to implement your own?
